title: ‘GotaGoGama’ continues onto 37th day
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The ‘GotaGoGama’ People’s Struggle in front of the Galle Face Presidential Secretariat demanding the resignation of the President continues for the 37th day today (15).
Our correspondents stated that a number of programs have been organized at the venue for Vesak Poya Day.
Meanwhile, today marks the third day of the ‘NoDealGama’ protest in front of Temple Trees.
Various groups joined the protest, saying the culture of political deals must change.
STF arrests two with US$ 47,000 transferred via Undiyal system
